definitions.title: vb. Pi. denom.
definitions.body: practice sorcery (As. kašâpu, id.);—Pf. 3 ms.: [[וְעוֹנֵן וְנִחֵשׁ וְכִשֵּׁף]] [[וְעָשָׂה אוֹב וְיִדְּעוֹנִ֑י]] 2Ch 33:6 (of Manasseh); elsewh. only Pt. as subst. ms. sorcerer, in Israel, [[מְכַשֵּׁף]] De 18:10 (following [[קׂסֵם קְסָמִים מְעוֹנֵן וּמְנַחֵשׁ]]); fs. [[מְכַשֵּׁפָה]] = sorceress Ex 22:17 (E); mpl. [[מְכַשְּׁפִים]] Mal 3:5 (named with adulterers and falseswearers); of diviners, or astrologers in Egypt ([[חַרְטֻמִּים]] q.v.) Ex 7:11 (P; ‖[[חֲכָמִים]]); in Babylon Da 2:2 (+ [[חַרְטֻמִּים]], [[אַשָּׁפִים]], [[כַּשְׂדִּים]]).
